changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.30

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed EPG dialog appearing when pressing RIGHT twice quickly from categories in FILM/SERIES sections (correct fix in Compose callback)

### Previous fixes (v1.0.29)
- Attempted fix for EPG dialog issue (incorrect location)

### Previous fixes (v1.0.28)
- Fixed movie categories not appearing in group management (now uses same data source as Dashboard)

### Previous fixes (v1.0.27)
- Fixed app update download not working on Fire TV
- Fixed adult categories visible to Kids profile
- Fixed navigation getting stuck after favorites
- Fixed EPG dialog on movies/series
- Fixed EPG overlay on dashboard
